ayahs.indonesian: Dan tahukah kamu apakah hari Kiamat itu?
ayahs.english: And what can make you know what is the Striking Calamity?

ayahs.indonesian: (Yaitu) pada hari ketika manusia seperti laron yang beterbangan,
ayahs.english: It is the Day when people will be like moths, dispersed,

ayahs.indonesian: dan gunung-gunung seperti bulu yang dihambur-hamburkan.
ayahs.english: And the mountains will be like wool, fluffed up.

ayahs.indonesian: Maka adapun orang yang berat timbangan (kebaikan)nya,
ayahs.english: Then as for one whose scales are heavy [with good deeds],

ayahs.indonesian: dia berada dalam kehidupan yang memuaskan (senang).
ayahs.english: He will be in a pleasant life.
But as for one whose scales are light,

ayahs.indonesian: maka tempat kembalinya adalah neraka Hawiyah.
ayahs.english: His refuge will be an abyss.
And what can make you know what that is?
It is a Fire, intensely hot.
